title: Chain freighter warps
body: After summoning your freighter, you can trigger another warp immediately to skip system cooldowns and reach missions faster.

title: Batch refiner inputs
body: Stack identical materials in one slot before starting the refiner to avoid partial leftovers and maximise time spent in menus.

title: Pay off settlement debt with products
body: Supplying high-value crafted goods counts toward settlement debt, letting you clear timers early without waiting for passive income.
